data.name: OIDC Tokens Manager
data.xml_template:
<route id="{{source}}" group="">
    <from uri="direct:{{source}}"/>
    <setHeader name="OIDC_CLIENT_ID">
        <constant>
            {{oidcClientId}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    <setHeader name="OIDC_CLIENT_SECRET">
        <constant>
            {{oidcClientSecret}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    <setHeader name="OIDC_CLIENT_URL">
        <constant>
            {{oidcClientURL}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    <setHeader name="TENANT_ALIAS">
        <constant>
            {{tenantAlias}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    <setHeader name="TOKEN_HEADER_OUTPUT">
        <constant>
            {{tokenHeaderOutput}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    <setHeader name="WITH_BEARER_PREFIX">
        <constant>
            {{withBearer}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    <process ref="oidcTokensManager"/>
    {{generateDestination target}}
</route>
